content: skill level beginner montgomery scarf this simple scarf is an ideal project for the beginner knitter bands of garter stitch frame a simple row of eyelets on a stocking stitch background just enough pattern to make this visually interesting but not enough to make it difficult also the garter stitch helps the scarf lie flat finished size approximately 6 5 x 80 inches instructions given for modifying dimensions materials 2 x 100g 136 yds each knit picks comfy bulky shown in vinca supplies 5 0 mm needles for the matching mitts download the montgomery gauge/gauge fingerless mitts pattern 16 stitches = 4 inches abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog put the tip of right needle through the first two stitches on the left needle and knit them together yo bring yarn from back to front over right needle www tricksyknitter com © megan goodacre montgomery scarf page 1 scarf cast on 25 sts if you want to change the width of the scarf increase or decrease the number of stitches by 2 s row 1-4 knit row 5 *k2tog yo repeat from * until 1 st remains on left needle k1 row 6-9 knit row 10 12 14 purl row 11 13 knit repeat these 14 row ending with row 9 until scarf is the desired length approximately 60 - 80 inches bind off www tricksyknitter com © megan goodacre montgomery scarf page 2
